players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I'm shocked by Alice's sudden death. We should all be more careful and vigilant to ensure the safety of our fellow town members."
Charlie: "Bob, I think we should investigate Diana to understand her actions and motivations."
Diana: "I'm saddened by the loss of Alice and I want to assure everyone that I had no involvement in her death. Let us focus on finding the real killer and bringing them to justice."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
